data.text: Hanchu misîrtheiloi neinun le roiinpuitak invâna ânlanga. Mahan nupangnu aoma, ân vôna hah nisa ania, male a ke nuoia thâ aoma male a lua han rênglukhum ârsi sômleinik kop aoma.
Amanu han nâinei lai a ta, male nâihana tuongin chapin ân ieka.
Misîrtheiloi neinun dang invâna ânlang nôka. Mahan Dragon sen lienpa lungei sari dôn le rikingei sôm dôn, a lu zeta rênglukhum inkhumin an oma.12:3: Dan 7:7
A remei leh invâna ârsingei munthuma semin munkhat a jêma, pilchunga ajuong mathâk zoi. Nupangnu nâineisuo a sâk kelen theina rangin a moton tieng han ândinga.12:4: Dan 8:10

Hanchu amanu han nâipasal a neia, namtina mingei chunga thîr tôkmol leh roijêk rangpu ha. Aniatachu Pathien le a rêngsukmun tienga rangin nâipang hah sutpaiin le lâkpaiin aoma.12:5: Isa 66:7; Lap 2:9
Nupangnu hah chu ramchâra, Pathien'n mun a minsûk pena, sûn isângkhat razannik sômruk sûnga donsûia a omna rang tieng han a rot zoi.
Hanchu invâna râl aom zoia. Michael le a vântîrtonngeiin dragon hah doiin an inbuonpui, ama le a vântîrtonngei khom an inbuonpui dêna; 12:7: Dan 10:13,21; 12:1; Jud 9
aniatachu, dragon hah motorin aom zoi, ama le a vântîrtonngei hah chu invâna om rangin phal khâi mak ngei.

Hanchu dragon lienpa, tienlâia murûl, Diabol aninônchu Soitan an ti ngâi, rammuol pumpui huongpu hah an mathâk pai zoi. Ama le a vântîrtonngei murdi khom pilchunga an juong mathâk pai ngei zoi.12:9: Aph 3:1; Luk 10:18

Hanchu invâna rôl inringtakin, “Atûn chu ei Pathien sanminringna le Rêngpa anghan a sinthotheina le a Messiah rachamneina ngei hah ajuong minlang zoi! Ei Pathien motona indinga sûn jâna ei lâibungngei le ei sarnungei nônngâipu hah invân renga an mathâk pai zoi.12:10: Job 1:9-11; Zak 3:1
Belrite thisen le chongtak an phuong sika han ei lâibungngei le ei sarnungei menena an changa, an ringna khom thi ngam rakin an phal sa zoi.

Masikin nangni invânngei le asûnga omngei, nin râiminsân ta roi! Aniatachu pilchung le tuikhanglien rangin idôra ântak mo ani zoi! Asikchu Diabol hah nin kôm ajuong chum zoia, male ama hah taksinân a sipa, zora bongte vai ke a dôn zoi ti a riet sikin,” a ti ki rieta.
Dragon han pilchunga juong mathâk paiin aom zoi tih ânriet lehan nâipasal nei nupangnu hah anûk a rujûl phut zoi.
Amanu hah dragon'n a tôn phâk loina rang kum thum in-ang donsûia a omna rang mun ramchâr tieng a vuong theina rangin minmupui mantha inik ngei hah pêkin aom zoi.12:14: Dan 7:25; 12:7
Nupangnu hah tuiin achôipai theina rangin a nûka dragon'n a bâi renga tuilien angin aphîta.
Aniatachu pilchungin nupangnu hah asana; a bâi a-ânga dragon'n tui aphît hah amelem zoi.
Dragon hah nupangnu chunga a ningthik sabaka, male a richisuonpârngei a la omngei Pathien chongpêk jômpu ngei le Jisua chongtak phuonga taksônom ngei murdi hah doia inbuonpui rangin a se zoi.
Male dragon hah tuikhanglien panga han ânding12:18: Male dragon ha ândinga; miziek senkhat ngei an dôn chuMale kên dinga, hi rachang hih imini anûkjûi lehin ânzomin aom. zoi.
